sentence.Network_en: Don't be such a hypochondriac!—there's nothing wrong with you.
sentence.Network_cn: 别这么忧心忡忡的了！—你根本没病。

sentence.Network_en: Howard Hughes seems to have set the standard for today's hypochondriac celebrities'tics and reclusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 霍华德·休斯似乎为如今强迫症名人们的怪癖和遁世树立了标杆.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: coined in French from Greek hupokhondriakos, from hupokhondria (see hypochondria)

entry.def: A hypochondriac is a person who continually worries about their health, although there is really nothing wrong with them.

means.word_mean: 1. a patient with imaginary symptoms and ailments
